section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents information about a person while in the role of an employee of some organization.

stentry.p: employeeId : Id (0..1)

"The number that the employer assigns to the employee that is acting as next of kin/associated parties. However, if the contact role is the patient's employer, this field contains the employee number of the patient at their place of employment." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-12.
employmentDuration : TimeInterval (1..1)
The date range during which a person is an employee in a given employment relationship.
employmentStatus : String (0..1)
The status of the employment relationship; e.g., Temporary, Permanent, Etc.
"The next of kin/associated party's job status." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-34. Possible values include (from HL7 Table 311): Permanent; Temporary; Other; Unknown.
jobCategory : CodeWithOriginalText (0..1)

"The employer's job code and the employee classification used for the next of kin/associated parties at their place of employment. However, if the contact role is the patient's employer, this field contains the job code/class of the patient at their place of employment." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-11.
Note: We are not sure how this differs from Occupation. They might be the same concept.
jobTitle : String (0..1)

'The title of the job held, for example, Vice President, Senior Technical Analyst. This is a local name for the employee's occupation that doesn't necessarily correspond to any scheme for categorizing occupation.' (HL7 v3)

"The title of the next of kin/associated parties at their place of employment. However, if the contact role is the patient's employer, this field contains the job title of the patient at their place of employment." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-10.
occupation : CodeWithOriginalText (0..1)
"A value that qualifies the classification of 'kind-of-work' based upon a recognized industry or jurisdictional standard." - HL7 Version 3 RIM.
workAddress : Address (1..1)
The person's office address. First choice for business related contacts during business hours.
workPhone : Telecommunications (1..1)
The person's office telephone number. First choice for business related contacts during business hours.
employer : Employer (1..1)
A person or business that employs one or more people, especially for wages or salary.

"The name of the organization that serves as a next of kin/associated party or as the next of kin of the patient. This field may also be used to communicate the name of the organization at which the associated party works." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-13.
